seo_description: Jacob Javits Convention Center boasts 760,000 sq feet of versatile space, and is host to the world's top trade shows, conventions and special corporate events.
detailpage_description: Jacob Javits Convention Center boasts 760,000 square feet of versatile space, and is host to the world's top trade shows, conventions, special corporate events and consumer trade shows. This meeting mecca features 75 state-of-the-art meeting rooms, the 15-story Crystal Palace ballroom, 45,000 square foot Galleria, and the River Pavilion convention space, overlooking the Hudson River.
